title: Fears of new omicron Covid variant prompts Israel to ban entry to foreigners
content:
1. Fears of new omicron Covid variant prompts Israel to ban entry to foreigners  NBC News
  2. Covid: Israel to impose travel ban for foreigners over new variant  BBC News
  3. Omicron Variant Is Reported in More Countries as Officials Grapple With How to Respond  The Wall Street Journal
  4. Israel barring tourists, renewing travel quarantine rules to contain Omicron variant  The Times of Israel
  5. Israel to close border, airports to non-citizen international travelers for 14 days due to omicron variant  Fox News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
